allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: reorganize Grafana dashboards by application namespace

This refactoring moves Grafana dashboards from a centralized location
to be co-located with their respective applications, following GitOps
best practices where each application owns its observability resources.

Dashboard Organization:
- cert-manager namespace: Cert-Manager dashboard
- network namespace: Cloudflared, Envoy, External-DNS dashboards
- rook-ceph namespace: Ceph Cluster, OSD, Pools dashboards
- kube-system namespace: Kubernetes system dashboards (API Server, CoreDNS,
  Global, Namespaces, Nodes, Pods, Volumes)
- volsync-system namespace: VolSync dashboard
- observability/unpoller: UniFi dashboards (Client DPI, Insights, Sites, USW)
- observability/grafana: Node-exporters, Prometheus, SMARTctl, ZFS dashboards

Changes:
- Enable allowCrossNamespaceImport in Grafana instance configuration
- Add external admin credentials configuration to Grafana CRD
- Update all namespace kustomizations to include dashboard resources
- Remove centralized dashboards directory
- Dashboards now appear organized by namespace/folder in Grafana UI

Benefits:
- Better separation of concerns
- Easier to manage dashboards with their applications
- Clear ownership of observability resources
- Proper namespace organization in Grafana
- Follows declarative GitOps patterns
EOF
)")
